name: TurboCAD Drawing File
summary: Learn about .TCW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The TCW file is only supported by the Windows version of TurboCAD and not the OS X version. To open it in the OS X version, you can export the drawing to the .DXF or .DWG format and import it into the OS X version of TurboCAD.
NOTE: TCW is also an abbreviation for "TurboCAD for Windows."

description: Proprietary 2D/3D vector graphics format used by TurboCAD, a professional 2D and 3D design program; may contain a 2D layout, a single 3D model, or an entire 3D scene.
